BattleEffectText.Name: Critical Strike
BattleEffectText.Desc: Attacks this Scene have {0}% chance to deal +50% damage and stagger damage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Critical Strike X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Attacks this Scene have X% chance to deal +50% damage and stagger damage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Luck
BattleEffectText.Desc: When rolling a die, roll {0} more times, apply the highest value and lose 1 Luck.

BattleEffectText.Name: Luck X
BattleEffectText.Desc: When rolling a die, roll X more times, apply the highest value and lose 1 Luck.

BattleEffectText.Name: Smoke
BattleEffectText.Desc: Deal and take {0}% more damage. Can stack up to 10. Dice Power +1 if the character has 9+ Smoke. Smoke is halved at the end of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Smoke X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Amplifies damage dealt and taken. At 9+ Smoke, all dice gain +1 Power. Stacks up to 10. Smoke is halved at the end of each Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Persistent
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the next {0} Scenes, upon taking lethal damage, revive with 30 HP and purge this.

BattleEffectText.Name: Persistent X
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the next X Scenes, upon taking lethal damage, revive with 30 HP and purge this.

BattleEffectText.Name: Burn Protection
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take {0} less damage from Burn this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Burn Protection X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take X less damage from Burn this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bleed Protection
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take {0} less damage from Bleed this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Bleed Protection X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take X less damage from Bleed this Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Shield
BattleEffectText.Desc: Prevent the next {0} damage taken for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Shield X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Prevent the next X damage taken for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Stagger Shield
BattleEffectText.Desc: Prevent the next {0} Stagger damage taken for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Stagger Shield X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Prevent the next X Stagger damage taken for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Clash Power
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the duration of the Scene, all dice gain {0} Power and deal {0} less damage, Stagger damage, and deflect Stagger damage in a clash if this character is affected by Power gain and loss.

BattleEffectText.Name: Clash Power
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the duration of the Scene, all dice lose {0} Power and deal +{0} damage, Stagger damage, and deflect Stagger damage in a clash if this character is affected by Power gain and loss.

BattleEffectText.Name: Clash Power X
BattleEffectText.Desc: All dice gain X Power and deal X less damage, Stagger damage, and deflect Stagger damage in a clash for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Slash Clash Power
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the duration of the Scene, Slash dice gain {0} Power and deal {0} less damage, Stagger damage, and deflect Stagger damage in a clash if this character is affected by Power gain and loss.

BattleEffectText.Name: Slash Clash Power
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the duration of the Scene, Slash dice lose {0} Power and deal +{0} damage, Stagger damage, and deflect Stagger damage in a clash if this character is affected by Power gain and loss.

BattleEffectText.Name: Slash Clash Power X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Slash dice gain X Power and deal X less damage, Stagger damage, and deflect Stagger damage in a clash for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pierce Clash Power
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the duration of the Scene, Pierce dice gain {0} Power and deal {0} less damage, Stagger damage, and deflect Stagger damage in a clash if this character is affected by Power gain and loss.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pierce Clash Power
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the duration of the Scene, Pierce dice lose {0} Power and deal +{0} damage, Stagger damage, and deflect Stagger damage in a clash if this character is affected by Power gain and loss.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pierce Clash Power X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Pierce dice gain X Power and deal X less damage, Stagger damage, and deflect Stagger damage in a clash for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blunt Clash Power
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the duration of the Scene, Blunt dice gain {0} Power and deal {0} less damage, Stagger damage, and deflect Stagger damage in a clash if this character is affected by Power gain and loss.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blunt Clash Power
BattleEffectText.Desc: For the duration of the Scene, Blunt dice lose {0} Power and deal +{0} damage, Stagger damage, and deflect Stagger damage in a clash if this character is affected by Power gain and loss.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blunt Clash Power X
BattleEffectText.Desc: Blunt dice gain X Power and deal X less damage, Stagger damage, and deflect Stagger damage in a clash for the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Prescript
BattleEffectText.Desc: Deal +10% damage and Stagger damage every time this character uses a Combat Page against a target consecutively. (Max. 30%) If this character uses a Combat Page against a different target, they deal -50% damage and Stagger damage for that engagement.

BattleEffectText.Name: Roadless Camelot
BattleEffectText.Desc: Each time this character uses a Combat Page, all other allies temporarily upgrade a random Combat Page in their hand for the rest of the Act.

BattleEffectText.Name: Zeal
BattleEffectText.Desc: (Unimplemented, does nothing as of currently.)

BattleEffectText.Name: Adapt
BattleEffectText.Desc: Change the position of the die with Adapt.

BattleEffectText.Name: Restoration
BattleEffectText.Desc: In {1} Scenes, purge this and this character recovers {0} HP. Increase stack by half of the damage received while this character has this status.

BattleEffectText.Name: Restoration X
BattleEffectText.Desc: In 3 Scenes, purge this and this character recovers X HP. Increase stack by half of the damage received while this character has this status.

BattleEffectText.Name: En Garde
BattleEffectText.Desc: Upon winning {0} clashes against the same target, inflict 1 Fragile and Stagger Fragile to them next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Stagger Fragile
BattleEffectText.Desc: Take {0} additional Stagger damage from attacks this Scene.
